caption:
“Faith is not escape, but endurance.”

Reflection:
The true pilgrim does not flee the world — he endures it with courage, carrying hope through the storm.

Commentary:
This reflection calls us to steadfastness. Faith doesn’t remove difficulty; it redeems it by teaching perseverance and peace.
